members.name: Md. Mifta-Ul-Jannat Tuhin
members.desc: Tuhin is an undergraduate student at BAU, Mymensingh. He has thrust for knowledge. Loves to make videos. He is a video editor & a designer. He is looking forward to a challenging career that will provide him with an opportunity that stimulates intellectual growth.

members.name: Fatema Binte Latif
members.desc: A girl who is passionate about voice arts & recitations. Experimenting with different kinds of art forms is her biggest curiosity. She loves to learn & grow.
